籤詩版本二:
Ke hoʻomaka ka ua pūnāwai lōʻihi e maʻemaʻe, ʻoi aku ka mālamalama o ka Jade Rabbit a me ka Golden Crow
Nalo na mea kahiko a puka mai na mea hou. E nana a halawai me ka puka deragona.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka ua lōʻihi a me ka mālamalama mua.
Hele nā ​​mea a pau e like me ka hoʻolālā.
解曰: Mālama ʻia e nā akua a me nā Buddha. ʻAʻohe pilikia o ka pōʻino. E maluhia ka huakaʻi. E hoʻi me ka hanohano i ka hopena.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua hui ʻo Jiang Taigong me King Wen
Moʻokūʻauhau Zhou. ʻO Jiang Shang, ka inoa aloha ʻo Ziya. ʻO ka poʻe Ji (mai Xuzhou ma ke Kai Kina Hikina). ʻO Fei Xiong ka inoa Taoist, a ua sila ʻia kona mau kūpuna ma Lu (inoa wahi), no laila ua kapa ʻia ʻo ia ʻo Lu Wang.
No ka pale ʻana i nā manawa pilikia o ka Mōʻī Zhou o Shang Dynasty, noho ʻo ia ma ka wai o ke Kai Kina Hikina a lawaiʻa i ka muliwai ʻo Weishui. Pololei ka makau, ʻaʻole ʻo kona manaʻo i ka lawaiʻa, akā, ʻo ke kuhina maikaʻi.
Ua lohe ka mōʻī ʻo Wen o Zhou i kona naʻauao a hoʻolimalima iā ia i kumu (kuhina nui). (He kanawalu kona mau makahiki i kēlā manawa) Ma hope mai, ua hoʻouka ʻo King Wu o Zhou i ka Mōʻī Zhou, ua luku ʻo Shang Dynasty, a ua hoʻokumu i ka mōʻī Zhou. Ua kapa ʻo King Wu iā ia ʻo Shangfu. Ua hāʻawi ʻia kāna keiki ʻo Ding Gong i ka inoa ʻo Marquis of Qi.
(ʻO ka manaʻo o kēia moʻolelo: ʻO Jiang Taigong, ka mea i kali lōʻihi i ka lawaiʻa ma ka muliwai ʻo Weishui no ka manawa lōʻihi, ua puka i waho mai ka pilikia a ua hoʻohana hou ʻia e King Wen.)
聖意: I loko o ka hale, pule ʻo Zhongping iā ia iho no nā pōmaikaʻi a me ka waiwai. Inā ʻaʻohe kuʻikahi, ʻaʻohe male. Ua nalowale nā ​​mea, ʻike ʻia nā maʻi, maikaʻi ka lua kupapaʻu ʻo Ji Xingshan.
古人: Ua hui ʻo Jiang Taigong me King Wen
